Text: How are youHi Judy How are you I sent Ingrid an email and she told me that you are still at Enron Thats good I tried to call you at work but the girl that answered the phone said that you were on vacation today How are the kids and Rob I think about you all of the time Ingrid told me that she told you that I got married It isnt Tod it is James Johnson that I dated in high school We could have saved each other a lot of heart ache and just stayed together He is really sweet He has boys so now there are boys in my house I am real outnumbered But its fun Are you still working parttime or fulltime There is so much to talk about we need to get together for lunch or something Maybe we could meet somewhere one day let me know My phone numbers are Home and work And now you have my email address Talk to you soon Laurie

RE Undeliverable Glad to hear from youPST Hi Glad to hear you are all doing fine Mom is good I am still on the northwest side of town I bought a house last summer which I am now trying to sell It is a three bedroom and since James and I got married it is too small I dont know if I mentioned it or if Ingrid did but he has three boys So we have found a bedroom house in the same neighborhood Prestonwood Forest that we will probably buy we just have to sell ours Mom also bought a house in the same neighborhood last summer She moved my Granny here from Port Arthur to live with her She is I think Mom is going to go crazy dealing with her Mother doesnt have much patience Let me know when you can go to lunch I would really like to see you See you soon Laurie Original Message From Townsend Judy SMTP Sent Monday December AM To Johnson Laurie L Subject FW Undeliverable Glad to hear from you Original Message From System Administrator ENRON Sent Monday December AM To Townsend Judy Subject Undeliverable Glad to hear from you Your message To Subject Glad to hear from you Sent Mon Dec did not reach the following recipients on Mon Dec The email account does not exist at the organization this message was sent to Check the email address or contact the recipient directly to find out the correct address TWCTULEtwcwilliamscom MessageID AECCDEDBAAAEDA AHOUMSMBXVcorpenroncom From Townsend Judy To Subject Glad to hear from you Date Mon Dec MIMEVersion XMailer Internet Mail Service XMSEmbeddedReport contentclass urncontentclassesmessage xmimeole Produced By Microsoft Exchange V xoriginalarrivaltime Dec UTC FILETIMEAACFBC returnpath ContentType textplain charsetiso Hi Laurie I was so glad to hear from youi was thinking about you So much has been going on here its just been unreal Youre right I thought it was Tod when Ingrid told me you had married someone from high school He was the only one I had known of Glad to hear you are doing well Hows your mom I think of her too Are you still living in the same area I am still working parttime There were more layoffs Friday Ive been taking vacation plus I have like weeks still left I would like to meet for lunch one daymaybe later this week Ill call you My email at home is and my home phone is Cell phone is where you can reach me most of the timepicking up and dropping off one of my many children Everyone is doing greatgrowing up too fast Talk to you soon Judy This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the
